mapper.select: SELECT PROJ.NAME projectName,DATE_FORMAT(S.SUBMITDATE,'%Y.%m.%d') submitDate,R.CHINESENAME retaileName,PC.NAME categoryName,P.NAME productName,PF.NAME familyName,S.TOTALPRICE totalPrice,S.AMOUNT amount FROM SALERECORD S,PRODUCT P,PRODUCTCATEGORY PC,PRODUCTFAMILY PF,RETAILER R,PROJECT PROJ WHERE P.ID=S.PRODUCTID AND PF.ID=P.PRODUCTFAMILYID AND PC.ID=PF.CATEGROYID AND S.PROJECTID = PROJ.ID AND S.RETAILERID=R.ID AND PF.ISACTIVE=PC.ISACTIVE=P.ISACTIVE=R.ISACTIVE=PROJ.ISACTIVE=1 AND S.IMPORTERID=#{promoterId} AND S.PROJECTID = #{projectId} ORDER BY s.SUBMITDATE DESC

select project.ID projectID, project.Name projectName, project.ProvinceID provinceID, project.PlacardPath placardPath, project.BackgroundPath backgroundPath, project.AssistantID assistantID, project.StartDate startDate, project.EndDate endDate, project.AdminID adminID, project.IsVisible isVisible, project.IsActive isActive, project.HaveFarmer haveFarmer, project.Description description from project inner join rprojectpromoter rpp on rpp.projectID=project.ID where rpp.isActive=project.isActive=1 and rpp.promoterID=#{promoterId} order by project.ID desc
